doc.summary: Do stuff needed in the common setup phase.
doc.text: Do stuff needed in the common setup phase. This is called during parallel mod loading.

doc.summary: Do stuff needed in the client setup phase.
doc.text: Do stuff needed in the client setup phase. This is called during parallel mod loading.

Registers additional objects. Those may be <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/registration/Registerable">Registerable</ref> as well. These objects will be registered  with the id of this object and optionally a name suffix.

doc.summary: Adds fields with additiona lregistry values to the <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/registration/tracking/RegistryTracker">RegistryTracker</ref>.
doc.text: Adds fields with additiona lregistry values to the <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/registration/tracking/RegistryTracker">RegistryTracker</ref>. This is only called, if  RegistrationBuilder#enableRegistryTracking() is set.

doc.summary: Everything that is registered to <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/mod/ModXRegistration">ModXRegistration</ref> that implements this can specify dependencies  and things to be done during setup phase.
doc.text: Everything that is registered to <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/mod/ModXRegistration">ModXRegistration</ref> that implements this can specify dependencies  and things to be done during setup phase.
